title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 641.3 - Designation of employees who enforce only article 13 of the environmental conservation law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 641.3 - Designation of employees who enforce only article 13 of the environmental conservation law

State Regulations

Employees of the Department of Environmental Conservation
having the titles of food inspector or senior food inspector are designated to
enforce the provisions of article 13 of the Environmental Conservation Law, and
the rules, regulations and orders enacted or promulgated thereunder, as
provided by section
71-0201
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
641.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
